cause.description:
We are in support of CCFE, or the Citizens Campaign Fund for the Enviornment. This organization works on issues of importance to new york state such as clean air, water, wetlands protection, open space, and wildlife conservation.
1. Clean Air/Water is a Universal Right
2. The only way to make a difference is to think globally and act locally
cause.mission: Protect the enviornment and public health, starting on the local level
cause.name: Local Enviornmental Issues
